00001 //Filename    : ORESTXT.CPP
00002 //Description : Text Resource library handling object
00003 
00004 #include <ALL.H>
00005 #include <OSTR.H>
00006 #include <ORESTXT.H>
00007 
00008 //------------ Format of RTI file -------------//
00009 //
00010 // The structure of Resource Text Index file :
00011 //
00012 // The file is consist of a number of index block :
00013 //
00014 // enum { INDEX_NAME_LEN=40, PICT_NAME_LEN=8 };
00015 //
00016 // struct ResIndex
00017 // {
00018 //   char  title[INDEX_NAME_LEN+1];
00019 //   char  gif_name[PICT_NAME_LEN+1];
00020 //   short text_size;   // size of the text body
00021 //   long  file_pos;    // pointer to text body in the RTX file
00022 // }
00023 //
00024 //---------------------------------------------//
00025 
00026 //----------- Format of RTX file ---------------//
00027 //
00028 // The structure of Resource Text file :
00029 //
00030 // <char..> = text data
00031 //
00032 //---------------------------------------------//
00033 
00034 //---------- Begin of function ResTxt::init ----------//
00040 void ResTxt::init(char* resName, int alwaysOpenFlag) {
00041     if( init_flag )
00042         deinit();
00043 
00044     //------ Load Resource Text Index -------//
00045 
00046     String str  = resName;
00047     str        += ".RTI";
00048 
00049     File file;
00050     file.file_open(str);
00051 
00052     rec_count = file.file_get_short();
00053 
00054     txt_index_array = (TxtIndex*) mem_add( sizeof(TxtIndex) * rec_count );
00055 
00056     file.file_read( txt_index_array, sizeof(TxtIndex) * rec_count );
00057 
00058     file.file_close();
00059 
00060     //------ Open the Resource Text file for later reading ------//
00061 
00062     strncpy( res_file_name, resName, MAX_PATH );
00063     strncat( res_file_name, ".RTX" , MAX_PATH );
00064 
00065     res_file_name[MAX_PATH] = NULL;
00066 
00067     always_open_flag = alwaysOpenFlag;
00068 
00069     if( always_open_flag )
00070         file_txt.file_open(res_file_name);
00071 
00072     //------- Allocate a buffer for the text ---------//
00073 
00074     txt_buf_size = DEF_TXT_BUF_SIZE;                // this size should be large enough for average text unit, also we don't need realloc very frequently
00075 
00076     txt_buf = mem_add( txt_buf_size );
00077 
00078     init_flag = 1;
00079 }
00080 
00081 //----------- End of function ResTxt::init -------------//
00082 
00083 //---------- Begin of function ResTxt::deinit ----------//
00085 void ResTxt::deinit() {
00086     if( !init_flag )
00087         return;
00088 
00089     mem_del( txt_index_array );
00090     txt_index_array = NULL;
00091 
00092     mem_del( txt_buf );
00093     txt_buf = NULL;
00094 
00095     if( always_open_flag )
00096         file_txt.file_close();
00097 
00098     init_flag = 0;
00099 }
00100 
00101 //----------- End of function ResTxt::deinit -------------//
00102 
00103 //---------- Begin of function ResTxt::get_title ----------//
00112 char* ResTxt::get_title(int recNo) {
00113     if( !init_flag )
00114         return NULL;
00115 
00116     err_when( recNo<1 || recNo>rec_count );
00117 
00118     return txt_index_array[recNo-1].title;
00119 }
00120 
00121 //----------- End of function ResTxt::get_title -------------//
00122 
00123 //---------- Begin of function ResTxt::get_pict_name ----------//
00132 char* ResTxt::get_pict_name(int recNo) {
00133     if( !init_flag )
00134         return NULL;
00135 
00136     err_when( recNo<1 || recNo>rec_count );
00137 
00138     return txt_index_array[recNo-1].pict_name;
00139 }
00140 
00141 //----------- End of function ResTxt::get_pict_name -------------//
00142 
00143 //---------- Begin of function ResTxt::get_body ----------//
00152 char* ResTxt::get_body(int recNo) {
00153     if( !init_flag )
00154         return NULL;
00155 
00156     err_when( recNo<1 || recNo>rec_count );
00157 
00158     //----- check if the buffer is large enough -----//
00159 
00160     int textSize = txt_index_array[recNo-1].text_size;
00161 
00162     if( textSize+1 > txt_buf_size ) {               // +1 is the NULL at the end of the text
00163         txt_buf_size = textSize+1;
00164         txt_buf      = mem_resize( txt_buf, txt_buf_size );
00165     }
00166 
00167     //-------- read in the text into buffer ----------//
00168 
00169     if( !always_open_flag )                         // if not always open, then only open during reading, and close it immediately after that
00170         file_txt.file_open( res_file_name );
00171 
00172     file_txt.file_seek( txt_index_array[recNo-1].file_pos );
00173 
00174     file_txt.file_read( txt_buf, textSize );
00175 
00176     if( !always_open_flag )
00177         file_txt.file_close();
00178 
00179     txt_buf[textSize]=NULL;
00180 
00181     return txt_buf;
00182 }
00183 
00184 //----------- End of function ResTxt::get_body -------------//
00185 
00186 //---------- Begin of function ResTxt::locate_topic ----------//
00195 int ResTxt::locate_topic(char* titleStr) {
00196     if( !init_flag )
00197         return NULL;
00198 
00199     int       i;
00200     TxtIndex* txtIndex = txt_index_array;
00201 
00202     for( i=0 ; i<rec_count ; i++, txtIndex++ ) {
00203         if( strcmp( txtIndex->title, titleStr )==0 )
00204             return i+1;
00205     }
00206 
00207     return 0;
00208 }
00209 
00210 //----------- End of function ResTxt::locate_topic -------------//
